text: Ronald Andrew Whelan (born 25 September 1961) is a former Irish football player. During his playing career, he played as a midfielder and sometimes as a defender. He was a part of a dominant Liverpool side that won a many titles in the 1980s. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League League League FA Cup FA Cup League Cup League Cup Europe Europe
